summary: An ordinance relating to the acquisition of property by condemnation and/or purchase for the widening of 15th Avenue Northwest between West 46th Street and West 52nd Street, and the construction of a grade separation therein, as contemplated by Ordinance No. 83369; authorizing expenditures by the Engineering and Law Departments, in connection therewith; and making an appropriation from the Seattle General Arterial Improvement Bonds 1954 Fund therefor.
